com.intland.codebeamer.utils

Enum AnchoredPeriod.Anchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AnchoredPeriod.Anchor>
      • com.intland.codebeamer.utils.AnchoredPeriod.Anchor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AnchoredPeriod.Anchor>
    Enclosing class:
    AnchoredPeriod

    public static enum AnchoredPeriod.Anchor
extends java.lang.Enum<AnchoredPeriod.Anchor>
    An anchor defines the relative position of a time period relative to an anchor date

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      Current
      The current (alias "this") period, where the anchor date falls into
      Future
      The next X periods after but not including the current/anchor period
      Last
      The last X periods before and including (ending with) the current/anchor period
      Next
      The next X periods after and including (starting with) the current/anchor period
      Past
      The last X periods before but not including the current/anchor period

      • decode

        public static AnchoredPeriod.Anchor decode(java.lang.String name)
        Decode an anchor string into the appropriate Anchor. Case is not not relevant.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
